Question 132) L.J.C.
- 5 shots? - AND.
- Playing the catcher? - AND. The PM thought… - Today? - Cedinho.
COELHO, M. In: FREIRE, M. (Org.). The 100 minor Brazilian tales of the century. São Paulo: Editorial Atelier, 2004.
Punctuation signals are elements with important functions for thematic progression. In this miniconto, the ellipsis was used to indicate
A) A hesitant speech.
B) implicit information.
C) an inconsistent situation.
D) the elimination of an idea.
E) the interruption of an action.
